dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.spec.ServiceSpecCharUse
dataStructure.description:
A use of the ServiceSpecCharacteristic by an ServiceSpecification to which additional properties (attributes) apply or override the properties of similar properties contained in ServiceSpecCharacteristic.This aggregation defines the set of ServiceCharacteristicSpecs that are defined by a given ServiceSpecification.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceSpecCharUse

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which the CharacteristicSpecification is known and distinguished from other CharacteristicSpecifications.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains the CharacteristicSpecification.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: _package
child.description:
An indicator that specifies if the associated ServiceSpecCharacteristic is a composite.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _package

child.name: canBeOveridden
child.description:
An indicator that specifies that the CharacteristicSpecValues associated with the CharacteristicSpec cannot be changed when instantiating a ServiceCharacteristicValue. For example, a bandwidth of 64 MB cannot be changed.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: canBeOveridden

child.name: minCardinality
child.description:
The minimum number of instances a CharacteristicValue can take on. For example, zero to five phone numbers in a group calling plan, where zero is the value for the minCardinality.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: minCardinality

child.name: maxCardinality
child.description:
The maximum number of instances a CharacteristicValue can take on. For example, zero to five phone numbers in a group calling plan, where five is the value for the maxCardinality.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: maxCardinality

child.name: extensible
child.description:
An indicator that specifies that the values for the characteristic can be extended by adding new values when instantiating a characteristic for a Service.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: extensible

child.name: globallySet
child.description:
An indicator that specifies that the attribute value for a ServiceSpecCharacteristic is defined by the related ServiceDefinition and applies to all ServiceTemplates based on the ServiceDefinition.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: globallySet

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time for which the use of the CharacteristicSpecification is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: unique
child.description:
An indicator that specifies if a value is unique for the specification. Possible values are; "unique while value is in effect" and "unique whether value is in effect or not"

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: unique
